title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. III, pt. 582 - Local Land Use Programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. III, pt. 582 - Local Land Use Programs

State Regulations
§ 582.1 - Local land use programs under the adirondack park agency act
§ 582.2 - Criteria for approval of local land use programs
§ 582.3 - Criteria for approval of local land use programs relative to a geographic portion of a local government
§ 582.4 - Criteria for approval of components of local land use programs
§ 582.5 - Amendments to approved local land use programs
§ 582.6 - Agency review of variances from approved local land use programs
§ 582.7 - Notification to the agency of class b regional project applications
§ 582.8 - Transfer to local governments of jurisdiction over certain freshwater wetlands
§ 582.9 - Submission of rivers system land management plans by local governments

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. Q, ch. III, pt. 582

Statutory authority: Executive Law, §§801, 807, 808; Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 15-2709[1], 24-0105[6], 24-0801, 24-0803, 24-0805

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
